name: 高科技人力資源專題研究
description: 整合人力資源相關知識應用於高科技產業人力資源議題研究與專案之開發。This course is designed to train students in research and project development related to human resource issues in hitech industries. Relevant HR problems, issues and research methods will be introduced and discussed. Students will then practice how to develop and complete a research project. This course will be taught using a combination of instructional methods including group discussions, student presentations, and independent study.
goals: Describe current research that is being done in the field of human resource development and management in hi-tech industries.
Explain the important issues and trends in managing and developing human resources in hi-tech companies
Develop a research topic that pertains to current and important human resource problems in the hi-tech industries.
Critically review extant literature related to the research topic.
Carry out the appropriate research procedure to help solve human resource problems in the hi-tech industries.
syllabus:
Week 1  
Course introduction, syllabus review  
Week 2  
The nature of hi-tech companies  
Week 3- 5  
Human resource issues in hi-tech industries  
Week 6- 8  
Research issues in OB/HR in hi-tech industries  
Week 9-10  
Research methods to study OB/HR in hi-tech companies  
Week 11-12  
Qualitative analysis in OB/HR research  
Week 13-15  
Statistical analysis in OB/HR research  
Week 16-18  
Reporting of HR research in hi-tech companies

methodologies.note: Important issues and trends in managing and developing human resources in hi-tech companies will be introduced
Students will discuss related issues and trends introduced by the instructor and research topics presented by fellow students
Students will carry out a research project to study a current problem in human resources

grading.note: Students are encouraged to actively participate in class discussions to enrich the learning.
Students are required to introduce and present assigned readings in class.

Students will carry out a research project to study a current problem in human resources. Students are required to present the project orally in class and submit the completed written research report at the end of semester.
